title: Identity Schema & Migration
description: Define User, MerchantAccount, and Token models in Prisma with relations and encryption fields.
acceptance_criteria: Prisma schema compiles; Migration applied; Encryption helpers unit tested
definition_of_done: Schema merged to main; Local DB migrated

title: Salla OAuth Service Implementation
description: Develop core service for URL generation, state management, and token exchange.
acceptance_criteria: State param secure; Auth URL correct; Token exchange works
definition_of_done: Service unit tested with mock Salla API
deployment_notes: Env vars for Client ID/Secret required

title: OAuth Callback API Route
description: Implement Next.js API route to receive callback, validate state, and create session.
acceptance_criteria: CSRF validation passes; Session cookie set; Merchant DB record created

title: Frontend Connection UI & Error Handling
description: Build onboarding page with connection button and error toasts.
acceptance_criteria: Connect button works; Error params show toasts; Loading states visible

title: ClickHouse OLAP Schema Definition
description: Design and implement MergeTree structures for SalesFact and dictionaries.
acceptance_criteria: ReplacingMergeTree used; Partition keys optimized; Migration successful

title: Webhook Receiver & Signature Validator
description: Implement API route for Salla webhooks with HMAC validation.
acceptance_criteria: Validate X-Salla-Signature; Respond <200ms; 401 on invalid sig
definition_of_done: Endpoint deployed and tested with Postman

title: QStash Publisher Integration
description: Integrate Upstash QStash to queue raw webhook payloads.
acceptance_criteria: Webhooks published to QStash; Error handling active

title: ETL Worker Function Implementation
description: Worker to consume messages, transform JSON, and insert to ClickHouse.
acceptance_criteria: Parses Salla payload; Maps to Schema; Inserts idempotently
definition_of_done: Data visible in ClickHouse after webhook

title: TipTap Editor Integration
description: Implement TipTap editor with basic formatting for email templates.
acceptance_criteria: Formatting works; State managed; Accessible toolbar

title: Tenant Isolation & Middleware Security
description: Implement RBAC checks in Next.js middleware and verify isolation.
acceptance_criteria: Unauthorized routes blocked; Cross-tenant access fails

title: Historical Data Import Strategy
description: Pagination logic to fetch history from Salla API and push to QStash.
acceptance_criteria: Handle rate limits; Paginate 24 months; Queue batches

title: Dynamic Variable Extension
description: Custom TipTap extension to insert variables like {{customer_name}}.
acceptance_criteria: Insert variable works; HTML export includes placeholders

title: QStash Scheduler Implementation
description: Service to schedule delayed HTTP calls for email triggering.
acceptance_criteria: Schedule job delayed; Store Job ID; Secure trigger endpoint

title: Purchase Event Cancellation Logic
description: Logic to cancel recovery jobs when order.created event is received.
acceptance_criteria: Order event triggers cancellation; Jobs removed from QStash

title: Postmark Email Integration
description: Implement email sending service with Postmark API.
acceptance_criteria: Hydrate templates; Send via Postmark; Log status

title: HTML Sanitization & Preview
description: Sanitize editor output and implement preview modal.
acceptance_criteria: DOMPurify used; Preview shows real HTML; XSS protected

title: pgvector Setup & RAG Schema
description: Enable pgvector and create schema for embeddings.
acceptance_criteria: pgvector enabled; Embedding tables created; Schema vectorized

title: Dead Letter Queue & Error Handling
description: Implement retry policies and DLQ routing for failures.
acceptance_criteria: Retries configured; DLQ functional; Alerting setup

title: OpenAI Client & Prompt Engineering
description: Setup OpenAI integration and system prompts.
acceptance_criteria: Secure client; Prompts include schema; Injection protection

title: SQL Generation & Validation Service
description: Service to request SQL from LLM and validate safety.
acceptance_criteria: Valid syntax; Read-only validation; Merchant ID scoped

title: RAG Context Retrieval Logic
description: Fetch schema info/docs from pgvector to augment prompt.
acceptance_criteria: Context retrieved matches query; Injected into prompt

title: Chat UI Implementation
description: Build frontend chat interface with streaming.
acceptance_criteria: Streaming text; Loading states; Data table rendering

title: Pipeline Load Testing & Optimization
description: Verify ingestion pipeline meets latency NFRs.
acceptance_criteria: 100 concurrent webhooks sustained; <5 min latency
